definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Bei3 fang1 Gong1 ye4 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: He represented one of the northern industrial constituency.
sentences.chinese: 他被選爲北方工業選區之一的代表。

sentences.english: The company has denied the accusations.
sentences.chinese: 北方工業否認了這些指控。
